title: Are You Fumbling This Baddie?
subtitle: She's a 10. You're... doing this quiz.

questions.text: She posts a thirst trap and it goes viral (AHHH). Your first thought?

options.text: I wouldn't say anything but it would bother me.
She's so fine it's actually insane.
That's my girl. Everyone can look, I get to touch.
Why does she need that kind of attention?

questions.text: She's having a rough day. What are you going to do about it?

options.text: Call her and let her rant.
Nothing. She can handle it.
Cronut and Chill.
Let her chill out and ask about it later.

questions.text: When she's going OFF about something --  loud, passionate, maybe a little unhinged -- your move is:

options.text: Try to logic her out of it because she's being 'irrational'.
Match her energy. We're both yelling now. It's kind of fun.
Tell her she's overreacting and walk away.
Let her ride it out. I'm here when the storm passes.

questions.text: What do you like about her? Pick the one that's most true.

options.text: She's hot and the sex is crazy.
She's the most interesting person I've ever met.
I honestly don't know anymore.
She makes me want to be better without even trying.

questions.text: She wants to talk about 'us.' Your honest reaction?

options.text: Pretend I didn't see the text until tomorrow.
Good. I probably have things I want to say too.
Nervous, but I'm showing up for it.
Immediately assume it's a trap.

questions.text: On a scale of 0â€“10, how much does her intensity scare you?

verdicts.title: She Might Actually Keep You
verdicts.description: Against all odds, you might not be delusional. Stay sharp. Woo that woman like you're still trying to get her number.

verdicts.title: You're Slipping...
verdicts.description: She's noticed. You still have time but the clock is ticking. She's a baddie. Woo that bitch.

verdicts.title: Fumble in Progress.
verdicts.description: Sir, the bag is in the air and you're watching it fall in slow motion. She's not asking for the moon. Talk to her. Believe in it. Woo that bitch.

verdicts.title: Certified Fumbler... Sheesh
verdicts.description: She's going to look incredible at the functions when you see her (if you see her) and realize what you had. This isn't a wake-up call. This is the obituary. You're cooked.
